\makeatletter

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

\makeatother

\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
Farming Problem with Trade:

Rich country is country r or 1

Developing country is country d or 2

price of good produced in country $i$: $p_{c}^{i}$

consumption of good from country i in country j: $c_{j}^{i}$
\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|}
\hline 
 & Rich Country & Poor Country\tabularnewline
\hline 
consumer & $\max$$\left[\ln(f_{r}^{r}+f_{r}^{d})+\gamma_{r}\ln(c_{r}^{r}+c_{r}^{d}+1)\right]$ & $\max$$\left[\ln(f_{d}^{r}+f_{d}^{d})+\gamma_{d}\ln(c_{d}^{r}+c_{d}^{d}+1)\right]$\tabularnewline
\hline 
agri producer &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
manu producer &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
 &  & \tabularnewline
\hline 
\end{tabular}
\par\end{center}
\end{document}
